tutorials <-  yaml::yaml.load_file("../metadata/tutorials.yaml")

    column(width = 2),

           fluidRow(style = "border-color: #dd4b39;",
                    div(h3(header)),
                    div(style = "color: #444;", content)
           )
    ),
    column(width = 2)
